original_title: Гоголь online: Кузмин. Форель разбивает лёд
overview: The new theatrical fantasy is inspired by the last, eleventh, book of poems by Kuzmin (her only lifetime edition is dated 1929). Work on the stage embodiment of this text for Nastavshev is akin to composing symphonic music, and he himself is the composer of the play.
title: Gogol online: Kuzmin. Trout Breaks the Ice
